author: trygvis
msg: o Updating the commands re the latest changed in the API.
o parseConnection() now handles "local" cvs repositories.
o Renaming CvsScmTest to AbstractCvsScmTest as a base class for all CVS tests.
o Added more of the common stuff from the test to the base test class.

author: trygvis
msg: o Added getWorkingDirectory() that the test cases should use as their base
o AbstractCommand will throw a exception if the return code is non 0.
Can be overridden by implementing afterExecute( int exitCode ).
o Removed throws Exception from getName() and getDisplayName().
o Removed some exception eating and made the methods throw ScmExceptions
